onSuccess.displayText:
Within the first hour of travel through {Forest1}, {Player} felt a quiet joy settle over him. The once-daunting labyrinth of greenery now seemed almost welcoming, every turn familiar, every path deliberate. His earlier patience and caution had paid off; seeking wisdom before acting had made all the difference.

As the hours passed and unseen dangers slipped harmlessly by, his steady pace carried him deeper into the forestâ€™s heart. Then, through the dense veil of trees, he saw it, a vast clearing bathed in sunlight, and at its center stood a great oak, just as it had been described to him before departing from the castle. Majestic and ancient, it loomed like a silent guardian of forgotten truths..
